    • captuPoke

      public String captuPoke(String num, String mote, String user, int lugar)
      Method in charge of capturing a pokemon
      Parameters:
      num - Number of the pokedex that corresponds to the pokemon
      mote - Nickname that you want to assign to the pokemon
      user - User who wants to capture the pokemon
      lugar - Where you want to save it
      Returns:
      Returns whether or not he was able to save the pokemon

      mote - Pokemon nickname
      Returns:
